entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm.
